Package frc.robot

Class Lib4150DigitalEdgeOn

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.Lib4150DigitalEdgeOn
public class Lib4150DigitalEdgeOn extends Object
The DigEdgeOn class implements edge on detection, used by sequential boolean logic where the output is true only when the input transitions from false to true.
File: Lib4150DigitalEdgeOn.java

Referenceable items: (classes)
Lib4150DigitalEdgeOn

Depends on:
none - no external libraries required

Operating system specifics:
None - transportable

Notes:
For this to work correctly, the execute method needs to be called everytime the input value is acquired.
This is a sample class. It contains an overloaded constructor, and a method to execute the logic.
